Key:
All right, now that I'm done with dinner,
I should rest a little.
Translation: Muy bien, ahora que he terminado de cenar, debería descansar un poco.

Key: Hm...? What's that sound...?
Is it coming from outside the window?
Who's outside? Rinne...? No, can't be.
Translation: ¿Quién está afuera? ¿Rinne...? No, no puede ser.

Key: Hmm...?
What, Kurumi?! What are you doing here?!

Is she inviting me out? I guess I should go...
Well, but...
Translation: ¿Me está invitando a salir? Supongo que debería ir...  Bueno, pero...

Key: Should I stay, or should I go?
I should ask Kotori.
...Hello? What do you want?
Oh, Kotori? You aren't home, are you?
What is it, Shido? What happened?
Kurumi's outside of our house.
Translation: Kurumi está fuera de nuestra casa.

Key: I see, so Kurumi is outside of—WAIT, WHAT?!
Translation: Ya veo, así que Kurumi está fuera de... ¡¿QUÉ?!

Key:
Seems like she wants me to meet her. Is it
okay for me to go?
Translation: Parece que quiere que la conozca. ¿Está bien que vaya?

Key: If it's Kurumi you're dealing with, it\nsounds suspicious...
Translation: Si se trata de Kurumi, suena sospechoso...

Key: But, we can't just let her be, can we?
I've said this many times, but you currently\nlack the ability to heal yourself. If you go,\nyou're exposing yourself to danger!
Translation: Lo he dicho muchas veces, pero actualmente no tienes la capacidad de curarte a ti mismo. ¡Si te vas, te expones al peligro!

Key: Yeah, I know, but...
Kotori, I think you should let Shin decide.
Translation: Kotori, creo que deberías dejar que Shin decida.

Key: Reine-san?
H-Hey, Reine! Why are you butting into the\ntransmission?!
Translation: ¡H-Hey, Reine! ¡¿Por qué te metes en la transmisión?!

Key: Truthfully, I see no issue with him going.
Translation: La verdad, no veo ningún problema en que se vaya.

Key: Reine-san!
Reine, what are you saying? There's no\nway I could put him in dang—
Translation: Reine, ¿qué estás diciendo? No hay manera de que pueda ponerlo en peligro...

Key: No. In my honest opinion, Kurumi wouldn't\nhurt Shin.
Translation: No. En mi honesta opinión, Kurumi no le haría daño a Shin.

Key: How did you come to that conclusion?
I have extrapolated my decision from recent\ndevelopments. She has had many chances to\nattack Shin, but he's still safe, isn't he?
Translation: He extrapolado mi decisión de los recientes acontecimientos. Ha tenido muchas oportunidades de atacar a Shin, pero aún está a salvo, ¿no?

Key: You've got a point, but—
Um, so what should I do?
Hm. Well, as Reine suggested, I'll leave\nit to you, Shido.
Translation: Hm. Bueno, como sugirió Reine, te dejaré a ti, Shido.

Key: Oh, man... What should I do?
Okay, fine!
Don't go.
Go.

I'm dealing with Kurumi here. Who knows
what she's got planned?
Translation: Estoy tratando con Kurumi. ¿Quién sabe lo que tiene planeado?

Key:
Yeah. I shouldn't be rash. I'll just ignore
Kurumi for now.
Translation: Sí. No debería precipitarme. Ignoraré a Kurumi por ahora.

Key: Finally. I think that's a smart choice.
Translation: Por fin. Creo que es una elección inteligente.

Key: She's probably left by now, right?
She's gone. Now I feel guilty...
Translation: Se ha ido. Ahora me siento culpable...

Key: Then you should've gone. I didn't stop you.
Translation: Entonces deberías haberte ido. Yo no te detuve.

Key: No, it's fine. Thanks, Kotori.
Whatever's fine. I'll return home shortly.
Translation: Lo que sea está bien. Volveré a casa en breve.

Key: Kurumi... What could she have wanted?
...I'll go.

It's night time. Kurumi might be full of
surprises, but I can't just stand her up
like that.
Translation: Es de noche. Kurumi puede estar llena de sorpresas, pero no puedo dejarla plantada así.

Key: I see. Then be sure to provide a full report.
Translation: Ya veo. Entonces asegúrese de proporcionar un informe completo.

Key:
Hehehe. Nice of you to finally show up,
Shido-san.
Translation: Hehehe. Qué bien que por fin hayas aparecido, Shido-san.

Key: Kurumi, what are you doing here so late?

I forgot to mention something to you this
afternoon.

Afternoon? Like, when I bumped into you
in town?
Translation: ¿Por la tarde? ¿Como cuando me encontré contigo en la ciudad?

Key:
Yes. The time in which you helped me up,
Shido-san.
Translation: Sí. La vez que me ayudaste a levantarme, Shido-san.

Key: Y-Yeah. I remember.
Hehehe. Thank you for that.
Wha-What's gotten into you?
I realized I hadn't properly thanked you.
Translation: Me di cuenta de que no te había dado las gracias adecuadamente.

Key: Oh, well. Sure.
Well, I'll be on my way.
Wha... What was that all about?
Seems as though there is nothing to report.
Translation: Parece que no hay nada que informar.

Key: Haha... Hahaha...
